mapper.select: SELECT f.flight_id, SUM(p.payment_total) AS total_payment, a.airline_name FROM flight f JOIN payment p ON f.flight_id = p.flight_id JOIN airline a ON f.user_id = a.user_id WHERE f.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY f.flight_id, a.airline_name ORDER BY f.flight_id
